subjects.name: Engineering Mathematics
subjects.description: Covers various mathematical concepts essential for engineering.

chapters.name: Discrete Mathematics
chapters.description: Covers the fundamental concepts of discrete mathematics.
topics: Sets, relations, functions, partial orders and lattices
Combinatorics: counting, recurrence relations, generating functions

chapters.name: Linear Algebra
chapters.description: Focuses on matrices, determinants, and linear systems.

chapters.name: Calculus
chapters.description: Covers fundamental concepts of calculus.

chapters.name: Probability and Statistics
chapters.description: Introduces probability theory and statistical concepts.
topics: Probability distributions: Uniform, normal, exponential, Poisson, and binomial
Mean, median, mode, and standard deviation

subjects.name: Digital Logic
subjects.description: Focuses on Boolean algebra, circuits, and computer arithmetic.

chapters.name: Boolean Algebra
chapters.description: Covers the fundamental concepts of Boolean algebra.

chapters.name: Combinational and sequential circuits
chapters.description: Covers the fundamental concepts of combinational and sequential circuits.

chapters.name: Minimization
chapters.description: Covers the fundamental concepts of minimization.

chapters.name: Number representations and computer arithmetic
chapters.description: Covers the fundamental concepts of number representations and computer arithmetic.

subjects.name: Computer Organization and Architecture
subjects.description: Covers the structure and function of computer systems.

chapters.name: Machine Instructions and Addressing Modes
chapters.description: Covers the fundamental concepts of machine instructions and addressing modes.

chapters.name: Computer Components
chapters.description: Focuses on essential components of a computer system.

chapters.name: Instruction Pipelining
chapters.description: Covers the concept of instruction pipelining and related issues.

chapters.name: Memory Hierarchy
chapters.description: Explores different levels of computer memory.

chapters.name: I/O Interface
chapters.description: Covers input/output mechanisms in computer systems.

subjects.name: Programming and Data Structures
subjects.description: Covers programming concepts and fundamental data structures.

chapters.name: Programming in C
chapters.description: Focuses on C programming language fundamentals.

chapters.name: Data Structures
chapters.description: Covers various data structures and their implementations.

subjects.name: Algorithms
subjects.description: Focuses on algorithm design, analysis, and common algorithmic problems.

chapters.name: Basic Algorithms
chapters.description: Covers fundamental algorithmic operations.

chapters.name: Algorithm Analysis
chapters.description: Focuses on analyzing algorithm efficiency.
topics: Asymptotic worst case time and space complexity

chapters.name: Algorithm Design Techniques
chapters.description: Covers various approaches to algorithm design.

chapters.name: Graph Algorithms
chapters.description: Focuses on algorithms for graph problems.

subjects.name: Theory of Computation
subjects.description: Covers fundamental concepts in computational theory.

chapters.name: Finite Automata
chapters.description: Focuses on regular languages and finite automata.

chapters.name: Context-free Languages
chapters.description: Covers context-free grammars and related concepts.
topics: Pumping lemma for regular and context-free languages

chapters.name: Turing Machines
chapters.description: Introduces Turing machines and undecidability.

subjects.name: Compiler Design
subjects.description: Covers the process of designing and implementing compilers.

chapters.name: Lexical and Syntactic Analysis
chapters.description: Focuses on the initial stages of compilation.

chapters.name: Intermediate Code Generation
chapters.description: Covers the generation of intermediate code.

chapters.name: Optimization
chapters.description: Focuses on code optimization techniques.
topics: Data flow analyses: constant propagation, liveness analysis, common sub expression elimination

subjects.name: Operating System
subjects.description: Covers fundamental concepts and components of operating systems.

chapters.name: Process Management
chapters.description: Focuses on managing processes and threads.

chapters.name: Scheduling
chapters.description: Covers scheduling algorithms for CPU and I/O.

chapters.name: Memory Management
chapters.description: Focuses on memory allocation and virtual memory.

chapters.name: File Systems
chapters.description: Covers file system concepts and implementation.

subjects.name: Databases
subjects.description: Covers database concepts, models, and management systems.

chapters.name: Data Models
chapters.description: Focuses on different data models used in databases.
topics: Relational model: relational algebra, tuple calculus, SQL

chapters.name: Database Design
chapters.description: Covers database design principles and normalization.

chapters.name: Data Organization and Indexing
chapters.description: Focuses on file organization and indexing techniques.

chapters.name: Transaction Management
chapters.description: Covers transaction processing and concurrency control.

subjects.name: Computer Networks
subjects.description: Covers network architectures, protocols, and technologies.

chapters.name: Network Architecture
chapters.description: Focuses on layered network models and switching concepts.
topics: Concept of layering: OSI and TCP/IP Protocol Stacks
Basics of packet, circuit and virtual circuit switching

chapters.name: Data Link Layer
chapters.description: Covers data link layer protocols and technologies.

chapters.name: Network Layer
chapters.description: Focuses on routing and addressing in networks.
topics: Routing protocols: shortest path, flooding, distance vector and link state routing
Fragmentation and IP addressing, IPv4, CIDR notation
Basics of IP support protocols (ARP, DHCP, ICMP)

chapters.name: Transport Layer
chapters.description: Covers transport layer protocols and concepts.

chapters.name: Application Layer
chapters.description: Focuses on application layer protocols.
